title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Edwards Avenue, a town highway, between interchange 71 of IR 495 (SH 67-3 and SH 69-4) and

Route 25 (SH 8066), a distance of 1.7+- miles is designated as an access
highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. in the Towns of

Brookhaven and Riverhead. (b) Route
110. Route 110 (SH 794) between interchange 49 of I-495 (SH 60-1) and

Bethpage-Spagnoli Road in the Town of Huntington. (c) Pinelawn Road/Wellwood Avenue, CR 3, a
county road, between Straight Path (CR 2) and Interchange 49 of I-495 (SH 60-1
and SH 60-2), a distance of 5.6 miles, is designated as an access highway for
special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (d) Grand Boulevard. Grand Boulevard between

Carll's Path and Corbin Avenue in the Towns of Babylon and Islip; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (e) Nicolls Road. Nicolls

Road, CR 97, between Interchange 62 of IR 495 and Furrows Road, in the Towns of

Brookhaven and Islip. (f) Commack

Road. Commack Road between Interchange 52 and the I-495 and Grand Boulevard, in
the Towns of Babylon and Huntington; provided, however, that this route shall
only be used between the hours of 7:00 p.m. and 7:00 a.m. (g) Waverly Avenue. Waverly Avenue between

Furrows Road and Long Island Avenue, in the Towns of Brookhaven and

Islip. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8147.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
